trackTitle: Excel for Corporate MIS and Data Analysis
description: A job-oriented Excel and MIS roadmap covering formulas, data analysis, pivots, Power Query, Power Pivot, KPI dashboards and corporate-style reporting for office professionals and students preparing for corporate roles.

institute.name: Coder & AccoTax
institute.author: Sukanta Hui
